mapper.select: /* 게시물 목록 조회 */ SELECT b.board_code ,b.board_category ,bc.category_name ,u.user_id ,b.board_title ,b.board_content ,b.board_file ,b.board_tag ,b.fix_check ,b.view_amount ,b.like_amount ,b.reg_date ,b.modify_date ,b.report_amount ,b.save_point FROM tb_board AS b INNER JOIN tb_board_category AS bc ON b.board_category = bc.board_category INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC;
mapper.insert: /* 게시물 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_board (board_code, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_file, board_tag, fix_check, view_amount, like_amount, reg_date, report_amount, save_point) VALUES (#{boardCode}, #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardCotent}, #{boardFile}, #{boardTag}, #{fixCheck}, #{viewAmount}, #{likeAmount}, NOW(), #{reportAmount}, #{savePoint})
mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_board SET delete_check = 'Y' WHERE board_code = #{boardCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tb_board WHERE delete_check = 'N'
ORDER BY board_code DESC;

/* 게시물 좋아요 조회 */ SELECT l.board_like ,b.board_category ,bc.category_name ,b.board_title ,l.board_code ,l.user_id ,l.like_reg_date FROM tb_board_like AS l JOIN tb_board AS b ON l.board_code = b.board_code JOIN tb_board_category AS bc ON b.board_category = bc.board_category JOIN tb_user AS u ON l.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY l.like_reg_date DESC;

/* 게시물 댓글 조회 */ SELECT co.board_comment ,b.board_category ,b.board_title ,bc.category_name ,co.board_code ,u.user_id ,co.comment_content ,co.reg_date ,co.modify_date ,co.report_amount FROM tb_board_comment AS co INNER JOIN tb_board AS b ON co.board_code = b.board_code INNER JOIN tb_board_category AS bc ON b.board_category = bc.board_category INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON co.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY co.reg_date DESC;
